title: Augmented Reality (MAR)-Based Indoor Design Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic geometric and spatial concepts
context.additional_context: Experiencing 3D space design and design simulation in a collaborative learning environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Students can use MAR technology to place 3D furniture models on 2D floor plans and explain spatial organization principles.
Learners can comparatively analyze the impact of various design layouts on spatial visual and functional effectiveness.
Students can complete full-scale virtual interior design in 4-member teams while maintaining motivation based on the ARCS model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
